author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: HIVE Digital Capacity Crosses 10 EH/s in May, Aims to More Than Double That by Year-End
description: The firm’s hydropowered Paraguayan facilities fuelled a 58% monthly hashrate jump.
content: Bitcoin miner HIVE Digital Technologies (HIVE) has surpassed 10 exahash per second (EH/s) in hashrate capacity, a 58% increase from April, driven by the launch of a 100-megawatt hydro-powered site in… [+1324 chars]
